title: LLaMA 2 Fine-tuning
description: I trained LLaMA 2 on over 60,000 rows of custom data for question and answer generation. The resulting tool was acclaimed as saving "a significant amount of time".

title: DevOps Engineering Intern - FTD Solutions
description: Fully redesigned FTD's internal database. Created workflows for FTD and its clients in various platforms.

title: Orbify
description: Translates Integrify JSON forms into the XForms source code used in Orbeon Form Builder 2021 PE. There is also a branch available for the old 2019 PE version of Orbeon.

title: Cartesian Problems
description: A Java application for visualizing and comparing algorithms on a Cartesian Plane. I visualize how Graham Scan and Jarvis March construct a convex hull. I also compare a brute force method and a 2-factor approximation for minimum vertex cover.

title: julipp
description: An interpreter for a subset of the Julia language written in C++

title: UnitPlayground
description: An interactive interface for experimentation with units and their relationships.

title: Go Fish Extension
description: A firefox extension that allows up to four users to play against each other or against various AI. The two available AI players are based on logical rules and monte-carlo search trees respectively.

title: Azure AutoML for Student Grades
description: This study organizes some of this data and employs machine learning to analyze the claim that class attendance and sitting at the front of a classroom improve student grades. We perform a correlation analysis in Azure's Machine Learning workspace by training regression models.

title: Interactive Earthquake Visualization
description: A visualization and presentation of seismic data using Tableau. The data was obtained on Kaggle and cleaned with OpenRefine and Tableau Prep

title: Buried Treasure
description: A Drupal 8 resource website for vacation bible school programs.

title: Nepali Christian Hymnal
description: Helped transfer a Nepali Hymnal and Bible application from Winforms to .NET MAUI.
